## ReadableBitcoinsMoneyp.getMPStake() method

Get the current state of an MP Stake.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getMPStake(address?: string, overrides?: BitcoinsCallOverrides): Promise<MPStake>;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  address | string | Address that owns the MP Stake. |
